episode.title: ‘Star Wars: The Force Awakens’ Holiday Spectacular

episode.author: Daring Fireball / John Gruber
episode.description: A brief holiday chat about ‘Star Wars: The Force Awakens’, with a cavalcade of special guests, including Guy English and Amy Jane Gruber.
